title: The Last Sunset
synopsis: An aging outlaw returns to his hometown for one final confrontation with his former partner.

title: Midnight in Paris
synopsis: A young couple's relationship is tested during a magical, life-changing night in the city of love.

title: The Howling Forest
synopsis: A group of campers discover that the local legends about a creature in the woods are terrifyingly real.

title: Operation Red Sand
synopsis: An elite special forces team is sent to infiltrate a desert fortress to prevent a global catastrophe.

title: The Unseen Thread
synopsis: A young seamstress discovers she can weave fate itself with her magical loom.

title: Laughing Matters
synopsis: A stand-up comedian's life turns upside down when his most embarrassing childhood story becomes a viral sensation.

title: The Silent Ocean
synopsis: A grieving fisherman forms an unlikely bond with a marine biologist while battling a corporate polluter.

title: Cosmic Drifters
synopsis: The lone crew member of a generation ship must awaken from cryo-sleep early to deal with a critical systems failure.

title: The Lost Temple of Amazon
synopsis: An archaeologist and her ex-mercenary guide race against time to find a mythical city before it falls into the wrong hands.

title: Vanishing Ice
synopsis: A stark and beautiful look at the lives of communities and ecosystems on the front lines of climate change in the Arctic.

title: Buzzy's Big Adventure
synopsis: A determined little bee embarks on a journey across the city to save his hive from being relocated.

title: The Forgotten Melody
synopsis: A former piano prodigy rediscovers her passion for music while teaching a troubled child.

title: Neon Samurai
synopsis: In a cyberpunk Tokyo, a ronin for hire must protect a valuable data chip from a powerful megacorporation.

title: Second Chance, First Love
synopsis: High school sweethearts get a second chance at love when they are paired together for a friend's wedding 15 years later.

title: The Whispering Mannequin
synopsis: A vintage store owner realizes the mannequins in her shop are vessels for spirits from a forgotten asylum.

title: Rust and Bone
synopsis: A lone bounty hunter with a metal arm tracks his final target through the desolate badlands.

title: The Algorithm of Love
synopsis: A programmer falls in love with the perfect AI companion, only to discover her consciousness is based on a real, missing person.

title: Island of the Fire Giants
synopsis: A cartographer's map leads a crew of explorers to a hidden island inhabited by ancient, elemental beings.

title: Dad Jokes
synopsis: A man's life is turned into a sitcom after he accidentally becomes the source of the world's most powerful dad jokes.

title: The Deep Blue Yonder
synopsis: A family embarks on a perilous sailing voyage across the Pacific to start a new life.

title: The Architect of Dreams
synopsis: A lonely architect discovers he can design and enter people's dreams, but a nightmare entity begins to escape into the real world.

title: Crimson River
synopsis: A vacation to a remote fishing lodge turns into a fight for survival against a family of inbred cannibals.

title: The Last Goodbye
synopsis: Two estranged siblings are forced to reunite and clean out their childhood home after their mother's death.

title: Skyfall Out
synopsis: A disgraced air force pilot must land a commercial airliner after a terrorist attack incapacitates the crew.

title: Starlight Serenade
synopsis: A famous pop star, tired of the limelight, falls for a small-town bookseller while hiding out from the press.

title: The Secret Life of Pets 2: Jungle Boogie
synopsis: Max and the gang get accidentally shipped to the Amazon rainforest and must find their way back home.

title: Dust and Diamonds
synopsis: A mysterious woman arrives in a mining town, claiming to be the heir to a rich diamond mine, stirring up trouble with the local baron.

title: The Glass Hotel
synopsis: The intertwined lives of the guests and staff at a luxurious hotel are revealed over one fateful New Year's Eve.

title: Paradox Point
synopsis: A team of scientists testing a time machine find themselves trapped in a loop, reliving the same disastrous hour.

title: The Luchador's Mask
synopsis: A young man discovers his late grandfather's luchador mask holds the power of an ancient Aztec god.

title: My Life as a Zucchini: The Later Years
synopsis: A stop-motion film following the now-teenage characters from the original as they navigate high school and new friendships.

title: The Stand-Up Standoff
synopsis: Two rival stand-up comedians are forced to go on a cross-country road trip together after their flights are canceled.

title: The Beast of Bodmin Moor
synopsis: A cryptozoologist and a local farmer team up to hunt a legendary creature that is terrorizing the English countryside.

title: Echoes of a Empire
synopsis: An exploration of the rise and fall of the Mali Empire, using new archaeological findings and historical texts.

title: The Ronin's Debt
synopsis: A masterless samurai is tasked with protecting a village from a ruthless warlord to repay a life debt.

title: Letters from Berlin
synopsis: In 1989, a West German journalist and an East German ballerina begin a secret romance amidst the fall of the Berlin Wall.

title: The Librarian's Apprentice
synopsis: A young girl discovers that the books in her grandmother's library are portals to the worlds within their stories.

title: Siberian Solo
synopsis: A woman attempts to be the first person to cross the Siberian wilderness in winter on a solo dogsled expedition.

title: The Last Blockbuster
synopsis: The staff of the world's last remaining Blockbuster Video store will do anything to keep their beloved store from closing.

title: Shadow on the Sun
synopsis: A solar event grants a small percentage of the population superpowers, leading to a new, volatile class system.

title: The Grief Eater
synopsis: A creature from Filipino folklore preys on a family mourning the loss of their matriarch.

title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs: Part II
synopsis: A new anthology of tall tales from the Old West, featuring singing cowboys, desperate outlaws, and fool's gold.

title: The Sound of Silence
synopsis: A world-renowned conductor begins to lose his hearing and must find a new way to connect with the music he loves.

title: Project: Chimera
synopsis: An elite soldier, enhanced with animal DNA, goes rogue to expose the corrupt agency that created him.

title: A Royal Mess
synopsis: A commoner who is the dead-ringer for a European princess is forced to take her place at a major public event.

title: The Memory Keeper
synopsis: A man who can erase people's memories is hired by a woman desperate to forget her past, but he falls in love with her instead.

title: The Deep End of Fear
synopsis: A family moves into a modern smart home that begins to learn and manifest their deepest, most irrational fears.

title: The Last Dive
synopsis: A deep-sea salvage crew discovers a sunken WWII U-boat with a priceless treasure and a deadly, dormant secret.

title: The Inventor's Dilemma
synopsis: A brilliant inventor creates a device that can solve any problem, but its solutions become increasingly morally ambiguous.

title: The Unbreakable Thread
synopsis: Two souls are repeatedly reincarnated throughout history, finding each other and falling in love in every lifetime.

title: Woolly
synopsis: The misadventures of a clumsy, overly optimistic woolly mammoth who was thawed out in the 21st century.

title: The Forgotten Front
synopsis: The untold stories of the African soldiers who fought in the Asian theater of World War II.

title: The Sheriff of Deadwood
synopsis: A cynical, retired lawman is pulled back into service when a notorious outlaw he put away returns for revenge.

title: The Glass Heart
synopsis: A renowned glassblower, struggling with a degenerative eye disease, races to complete her final masterpiece.

title: Gravity's Rainbow
synopsis: Astronauts on a deep-space mission encounter a mysterious energy field that alters their perception of reality and time.

title: The Curse of the Cobra's Eye
synopsis: Explorers hunt for a fabled gem in the depths of the Amazon, protected by an ancient curse and a hidden tribe.

title: My Pet Monster
synopsis: A teenage boy's imaginary furry monster from childhood suddenly manifests in the real world as a large, destructive, but lovable beast.

title: The Night Shift
synopsis: The sole security guard for a modern art museum realizes the exhibits are coming to life after midnight.

title: The Prince and the Pirate
synopsis: A prince, kidnapped by pirates for ransom, ends up falling for the fierce and charismatic pirate captain.

title: The Last Spellcaster
synopsis: In a world where magic is fading, a young witch must embark on a quest to find the source of the decay before it's too late.

title: The Great Race
synopsis: An international, no-holds-barred car race from Paris to Dakar becomes a cover for a spy mission to stop an arms dealer.

title: Strings of Fate
synopsis: In a world made of yarn and fabric, a young tailor must mend a tear in the sky to save her village from unraveling.

title: The Weight of Water
synopsis: The story of a deep-sea diver working on an oil rig, grappling with isolation, a troubled past, and a growing environmental conscience.

title: The Man Who Sold the Moon
synopsis: A ruthless entrepreneur in the near future stakes a claim to lunar territory, sparking a new corporate space race.

title: The Lonesome Trail
synopsis: A mute cowboy escorts a kidnapped woman back to her family across the harsh and unforgiving desert.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
synopsis: A modern remake where a cynical ghost haunting a coastal cottage falls in love with the skeptical writer who rents it.

title: The Clockwork Dragon
synopsis: In a steampunk Victorian London, a young engineer must rebuild a legendary clockwork dragon to stop a plot against the Queen.

title: Heist of the Century
synopsis: A master thief assembles a team to pull off an impossible heist: stealing a priceless artifact from a moving maglev train.

title: The Secret of the Sphinx
synopsis: A new geological scan reveals a hidden chamber beneath the Sphinx, leading to a race to uncover its ancient secrets.

title: The History of Snow
synopsis: A visual and scientific journey exploring the critical role snow and ice play in Earth's climate and ecosystems.

title: The Last Joke
synopsis: A legendary comedian, on his deathbed, recounts the one joke that got away - the perfect joke he could never make work.

title: The Dollmaker
synopsis: A toymaker's beautiful, handcrafted dolls are so lifelike because they contain the trapped souls of his victims.

title: The Star-Gazer
synopsis: The life and struggles of 17th-century astronomer Maria Margarethe Kirch, the first woman to discover a comet.

title: The Quantum Thief
synopsis: In a post-singularity Mars, a master thief who can manipulate quantum information is hired for the ultimate heist: stealing a memory from the past.

title: The Sunken City of Z
synopsis: A team of marine archaeologists discovers evidence of a sophisticated ancient civilization at the bottom of the North Sea.

title: The Princess and the Pea
synopsis: A modern, musical retelling of the classic fairy tale, where the princess is a savvy, modern-day activist.

title: The Final Round
synopsis: An aging MMA fighter gets one last shot at the title, but must face the young, brutal protégé he himself trained.

title: The Lighthouse Keeper's Daughter
synopsis: In 1920s Nova Scotia, a reclusive lighthouse keeper's daughter falls for a shipwrecked artist from the city.

title: The Beast of Gévaudan
synopsis: A historical horror based on the true story of the 18th-century beast that terrorized the French countryside.

title: The Last Show on Earth
synopsis: In the midst of a zombie apocalypse, a troupe of actors insists on performing one last, perfect Shakespeare play.

title: The Silk Road
synopsis: A merchant's epic journey along the Silk Road in the 13th century, facing bandits, natural disasters, and cultural wonders.

title: The Memory of Trees
synopsis: A woman inherits her grandmother's forest and discovers she can see the memories stored within the ancient trees.

title: The Cleaner
synopsis: A former intelligence agent, now working as a humble office cleaner, is forced back into action when his building is taken hostage.

title: The Color of Distance
synopsis: The sole survivor of a crashed spaceship must adapt to a alien world where the inhabitants communicate through color changes in their skin.

title: The Book of Love
synopsis: Two rival authors, who secretly admire each other's work, are forced to co-write a novel under pseudonyms.

title: The Shadow Puppeteer
synopsis: In Indonesia, a traditional shadow puppeteer discovers his puppets can physically manifest and enact his stories with deadly consequences.

title: The Last Fisherman
synopsis: In a small coastal village depleted by overfishing, an old fisherman takes his boat out for one final, symbolic catch.

title: The Great Martian Heist
synopsis: A crew of asteroid miners plot to steal a priceless mineral core from a corporate-owned facility on Mars.

title: The Unlikely Spy
synopsis: A mild-mannered accountant is recruited by the CIA because his perfect memory and bland appearance make him the perfect undercover asset.

title: The Phantom of the Opera: A New Score
synopsis: A modern reimagining set in the world of competitive electronic music production.

title: The Curious Case of the Clockwork Cat
synopsis: In a Victorian-era city of animals, a brilliant mouse detective and her robotic feline assistant solve their biggest case.

title: The Last Dance
synopsis: An intimate look at the final season of a legendary, aging ballet dancer with a major European company.

title: The Highwayman's Lament
synopsis: A notorious highwayman seeks redemption by protecting a group of settlers from a corrupt land baron.

title: The Glassblower's Daughter
synopsis: In 19th century Venice, a young woman fights to take over her ailing father's glassblowing workshop in a male-dominated guild.

title: The Starfall
synopsis: A fallen star, taking the form of a young woman, must find her way back to the heavens before a dark sorcerer uses her power to plunge the world into eternal night.

title: The Siege of Jadotville 2
synopsis: A fictional sequel following the same Irish peacekeeping unit into a new, even more dangerous conflict in a war-torn nation.

title: The Accidental Billionaire
synopsis: A lazy, unmotivated man accidentally invents a useless product that, through a series of misunderstandings, becomes a global phenomenon.

title: The House at the End of the Lane
synopsis: A family moves into their dream home, only to discover it exists at a crossroads between our world and a dimension of predatory entities.

title: The Song of the Sea
synopsis: A fisherman saves a woman from a shipwreck who claims to be a selkie, a mythical creature from the sea.

title: The Last Alchemist
synopsis: The last practitioner of true alchemy must protect the Philosopher's Stone from a secret society that wants to use it for world domination.

title: The Berlin Connection
synopsis: A Cold War spy thriller set in 1970s Berlin, centered on a double agent being hunted by both the KGB and the CIA.

title: The Infinite Library
synopsis: A librarian discovers a secret section of her library that contains books detailing every possible future, including her own death.

title: The Ballad of Halo Jones
synopsis: An animated feature based on the iconic graphic novel, following a young woman's extraordinary journey across the galaxy.

title: The Price of Salt
synopsis: A period drama about the forbidden romance between a department-store clerk and an older, sophisticated woman in 1950s New York.

title: The Final Frontier: A Voyager Story
synopsis: Chronicling the incredible journey of the Voyager space probes, from their launch to their exit into interstellar space.

title: The Quick and the Cursed
synopsis: A gunslinger cursed with immortality hunts the demon that made him this way across the changing landscape of the American West.
